entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:12 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 1:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Temperature: 5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 4.7°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 80 late this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
